# Award Certificate Creator

> A free iOS app for creating beautiful award certificates. Choose from 5 elegant templates, enter names and messages, and generate professional certificates in seconds. Supports Japanese and English.

## About

Award Certificate Creator (表彰状クリエイター) is a mobile app for iPhone and iPad. Users can create award certificates, diplomas, and birthday cards by selecting a template and customizing the content. Features include vertical/horizontal text layout, auto-save drafts, history management, BGM preview, high-quality PNG export, and social media sharing.

## Links

- [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/id6748368413): Download the app for free on iPhone and iPad
- [Website (Japanese)](https://awardcert.honeymarron.com/): Official landing page in Japanese
- [Website (English)](https://awardcert.honeymarron.com/en/): Official landing page in English

- [Terms of Service](https://awardcert.honeymarron.com/terms-of-service): Usage terms and conditions
